==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = State Shift
|desc_1      = When hit by {{Electro}} or {{Pyro}} attacks, the Stretchy Electro Fungus will enter an Activated or Scorched state respectively, gaining enhanced attacks. A Stretchy Electro Fungus can only undergo state shift once.
* If the Stretchy Electro Fungus is defeated while Activated or Scorched, it may drop {{Item|Inactivated Fungal Nucleus}}, {{Item|Dormant Fungal Nucleus}}, and {{Item|Robust Fungal Nucleus}}, while the drop rates for {{Item|Fungal Spores}}, {{Item|Luminescent Pollen}}, and {{Item|Crystalline Cyst Dust}} will greatly reduce.

|name_2      = Stretch Spin
|desc_2      = Stretches itself, charges and spins its head around, dealing '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased, cooldown reduced.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, DMG increased to '''60% ATK''', knockback increased.
|caption_2   = Normal
|file_2_2    = Stretchy Electro Fungus Stretch Spin 2
|caption_2_2 = Activated
|file_2_3    = Stretchy Electro Fungus Stretch Spin 3
|caption_2_3 = Scorched

|name_3      = Orb Sling
|desc_3      = Throws an orb of Electro energy at the player, each dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} on hit.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased, throws 3 orbs in a row.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, DMG increased to '''100% ATK''', knockback increased.
|caption_3   = Normal
|file_3_2    = Stretchy Electro Fungus Orb Sling 2
|caption_3_2 = Activated
|file_3_3    = Stretchy Electro Fungus Orb Sling 3
|caption_3_3 = Scorched
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.<br>Unlike other Fungi, this creature possesses a cap with a luminous tendril sticking out of it. When in danger, it will release small electric orbs as a form of self-defense.|[[Archive]]}}
